original_text: Now Peter was sitting out in the courtyard, and a servant girl came to him. “You also were with Jesus of Galilee,” she said.
korean_text: 베드로가 바깥 뜰에 앉았더니 한 여종이 나아와 이르되 너도 갈릴리 사람 예수와 함께 있었도다 하거늘

sentences.original_text: Now Peter was sitting out in the courtyard
sentences.korean_translation: 이때 베드로는 뜰 밖에 앉아 있었고

sentences.original_text: and a servant girl came to him
You also were with Jesus of Galilee
sentences.korean_translation: 너도 갈릴리 사람 예수와 함께 있었구나
